item.title: First Moon Observation
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently, I purchased my first telescope. Soon I conducted my first observing session in my backyard. It was full moon, but the view condition isn’t that perfect. The view though telescope is wonderful, but not as astonishing as I imagined. I took some pictures though telescope by my phone. It is not perfectly but I still love it. Images I cropped the image for file sizing. 10x" 10x 30x" 30x Overall, I was very exciting during the whole observation.
